node.statement: Direction 1.10: INDUCTIVE PROOF via derivative identity r' = n*(p^{(1)} boxplus_{n-1} q^{(1)}). Base case n=2 proved (equality). Need: (a) a relationship between Phi_n(p) and Phi_{n-1}(p^{(1)}), and (b) a way to lift the (n-1) inequality to degree n. NOTE: <h,alpha> >= 0 is FALSE (node 1.7.2), so proof must NOT use it.
